title: Remove endorsement seeding from run.py
description:
Edit `src/backend/app/seed/run.py` to remove:
1. Import of endorsement seed module
2. The `DROP TABLE IF EXISTS endorsements` SQL line
3. The call to `seed_endorsements(session)` in the main seeding flow
Ensure the seeding script still runs successfully without endorsements.
acceptance_criteria:
- No endorsement import in run.py
- No `DROP TABLE IF EXISTS endorsements` line
- No call to `seed_endorsements()`
- Seeding script runs without errors (`python -m app.seed.run`)
